温まる: (ぬくまる) - to warm oneself; to sun oneself; to warm up; to get warm
温む: (ぬるむ) - to become lukewarm; to become tepid
温める: (ぬるめる) - to cool something down (e.g. by adding water)
温め酒: (ぬくめざけ) - warm sake (formerly drunk on the 9th day of the 9th month of the lunar calendar to ward off illness)
温もる: (ぬくもる) - to get warm; to become warm
温厚寡黙: (おんこうかもく) - (yoji) gentle and reticent
温厚篤実: (おんこうとくじつ) - (yoji) having a gentle and sincere personality
温古知新: (おんこちしん) - (yoji) developing new ideas based on study of the past; learning from the past
温室: (おんしつ) - greenhouse; hothouse; conservatory; glasshouse
温室効果ガス: (おんしつこうかガス) - greenhouse effect gas; greenhouse gas
温室栽培: (おんしつさいばい) - greenhouse horticulture
温州ミカン: (ウンシュウミカン) - satsuma mandarin (Citrus unshiu)
温州蜜柑: (ウンシュウミカン) - satsuma mandarin (Citrus unshiu)
温帯低気圧: (おんたいていきあつ) - extratropical cyclone
温度上昇: (おんどじょうしょう) - temperature increase; rise in temperature
温度差: (おんどさ) - difference in temperature; difference in degrees of enthusiasm, interest, commitment, etc.
温度調節: (おんどちょうせつ) - temperature control
温故知新: (おんこちしん) - (yoji) developing new ideas based on study of the past; learning from the past
温明殿: (うんめいでん) - pavilion housing the sacred mirror (in Heian Palace)
温暖前線: (おんだんぜんせん) - a warm front
温暖化ガス: (おんだんかガス) - greenhouse gases; heat-trapping gases
温暖化現象: (おんだんかげんしょう) - greenhouse effect
温暖化防止: (おんだんかぼうし) - prevention of global warming
温暖湿潤気候: (おんだんしつじゅんきこう) - temperate humid climate
温水タンク: (おんすいタンク) - hot water tank
温水プール: (おんすいプール) - heated swimming pool
温水洗浄便座: (おんすいせんじょうべんざ) - bidet toilet; washlet
温泉: (onsen) - fonte termal; onsen, estância de águas termais, spa termal
温泉たまご: (おんせんたまご) - egg slow-boiled so that the yolk is hard but the white is still soft (traditionally cooked in a hot spring)
温泉マーク: (おんせんマーク) - sign used to designate a hot springs (e.g. on a map); traditional style love hotel
温泉卵: (おんせんたまご) - egg slow-boiled so that the yolk is hard but the white is still soft (traditionally cooked in a hot spring)
温泉場: (おんせんば) - place where there are hot springs; hot springs spa
温泉玉子: (おんせんたまご) - egg slow-boiled so that the yolk is hard but the white is still soft (traditionally cooked in a hot spring)
温泉町: (おんせんまち) - hot-spring resort; spa town
温泉療法: (おんせんりょうほう) - hot-spring cure; onsen therapy
温泉街: (おんせんがい) - hot spring district (within a town)
温泉郷: (おんせんきょう) - hot-spring village; spa
温温: (ぬくぬく) - comfortably; snugly; cosily; easy; carefree
温湯: (おんとう) - comfortably hot bath; hot spring
温点: (おんてん) - heat spot; warm spot; hot spot; hot point
温石: (おんじゃく) - heated stone (wrapped in cloth and kept next to the body for warmth)
温習う: (さらう) - (also written as 浚う) to review; to rehearse; to practise; to practice
温色: (おんしょく) - warm colour; warm color; angry countenance
温血動物: (おんけつどうぶつ) - warm-blooded animal
温製: (おんせい) - hot dish (e.g. at a restaurant)
温言: (おんげん) - warming words; kind words
温野菜: (おんやさい) - heated vegetables; warm vegetables
温風: (おんぷう) - warm air (e.g. from a heater); spring breeze
温風暖房: (おんぷうだんぼう) - warm-air heating
温風暖房機: (おんぷうだんぼうき) - warm air heater
温麺: (うんめん) - type of sōmen made without added oil; specialty of Miyagi prefecture, usu. eaten in broth, esp. warm in winter
渫う: (さらう) - to sweep away; to wash away; to dredge
測る: (はかる) - to measure/to weigh/to survey/to time (sound, gauge, estimate); to conjecture/to infer/to surmise
測候所: (そっこうじょ) - weather measurement station
